MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G73 postcode area of Rutherglen, affecting properties in Greenhills Road and surrounding areas. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:00am due to a fault on our underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:30am on Friday, 23 October 2020
